name: person_id
description: A foreign key identifier to the person for whom the data was recorded.

name: sleep_date
description: The date the sleep log ended.

name: is_main_sleep
description: Defines a record as being the 'main sleep' record. Boolean value: true or false

name: minute_in_bed
description: Total number of minutes the user was in bed.

name: minute_asleep
description: Total number of minutes the user was asleep across all sleep records in the sleep log.

name: minute_after_wakeup
description: The total number of minutes after the user woke up.

name: minute_awake
description: The total number of minutes the user was awake.

name: minute_restless
description: The total number of minutes the user was restless.

name: minute_deep
description: The total number of minutes the user was in deep sleep stage.

name: minute_light
description: The total number of minutes the user was in light sleep stage.

name: minute_rem
description: The total number of minutes the user was in rem (rapid eye movement) sleep stage.

name: minute_wake
description: The total number of minutes the user was in wake stage.

name: src_id
description: This id functions as a denotation to signify the provenance of this entry
The total number of minutes the user was in wake stage.
